title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 158.2 - Methods of determining fineness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 158.2 - Methods of determining fineness

State Regulations

The fineness of agricultural liming materials shall be
determined according to procedure 1.002 of the Official Methods of Analysis of
the Association of Official Agricultural Chemists, 9th Edition, 1960, page one, or according to procedures of the American Society for Testing and

Materials. Notes

158.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
